name: International Security & Counter-Terrorism Reference Center (ISCTRC)
description: Provides information on security and terrorism policy and analysis. Contents include full-text coverage of journals and reports such as Stratfor Analysis, Stratfor Forecasts and Stratfor Geopolitical Diary, books, summaries and blogs. According to the vendor, “ISCTRC also combines deep background from scholarly writings with expert commentary from a variety of organizations, agencies and publisher and timely reviews of recent developments across the international political, military, economic, social and technical spectrum.”
